onboarding.title: Welcome to Vocado

onboarding.step2Description: Type a theme and generate your first custom list.

tutorial.welcomeSubtitle: Let's tailor the experience to your needs.
tutorial.tourSubtitle: Vocado is not just a flashcard app. It's an immersive world-based learning experience.
tutorial.tourWorldsDesc: Your vocabulary sets are "Worlds". Each world is a memory game that helps you master words through play.
tutorial.tourSmartDesc: Generate worlds from daily news, themes, or your own files using AI.
tutorial.playIntroDesc: We've prepared an introduction world for you. Click on the **first world card** to start playing and learning!
tutorial.playingDesc: Find all the matching pairs to complete the level.
tutorial.postGameDesc: That was just a taste. The real magic happens when you create your own worlds. Vocado uses AI to generate vocabulary lists from any topic you can imagine.
tutorial.createExamples:
"50 words about space travel in simple French"
"Kitchen utensils for a chef"
"Translate this article..."
tutorial.createInstructionDesc: Click the Create world button here to open the creation studio.
tutorial.finalSubtitle: You are ready to master a new language.
tutorial.finalDesc: Good luck on your journey! Don't forget to check out the daily challenges and the leaderboard.
